t: Watch Xuan Zang | Prime Video
s: During the Tang dynasty in the seventh century, the young Xuan Zang monk (Xiaoming Huang) is eager to know about Buddhism, so he begins his journey to India. During his journey, he struggles with all kinds of dangers, including natural disasters. He finally arrives in India and studies Buddhism.

t: Xuanzang - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Xuanzang (Chinese: 玄奘; Wade–Giles: Hsüen Tsang; [ɕɥɛ̌n.tsâŋ]; 6 April 602 – 5 February 664), born Chen Hui or Chen Yi (陳褘 / 陳禕), also known by his Sanskrit Dharma name Mokṣadeva, was a 7th-century Chinese Buddhist monk, scholar, traveller, and translator.

t: Xuanzang (film) - Wikipedia
s: 1 month ago - Xuanzang is a 2016 Chinese-Indian historical adventure film that dramatizes the life of Xuanzang (602—664), a Buddhist monk and scholar. The film depicts his arduous nearly two-decade overland journey to India during the Tang dynasty on a mission to bring Buddhist scriptures to China.
